definition: to discuss/to have a chat
surname Tan
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
surname Tan
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Let me talk to my girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我得跟我的女朋友談談。

sentences.english: Let me begin with the negotiations on the intermediate-range nuclear forces that are currently under way in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 讓我先談談正在日內瓦進行的關於中程核力量的談判。

sentences.english: They asked me for my impressions of the fair tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他們約請我今晚去談談對交易會的印象。

sentences.english: Most school counselors have offices where you can sit down and talk.
sentences.chinese: 大多數學校的輔導員都有辦公室，你能坐下來談談。

sentences.english: We should meet to talk over the party.
sentences.chinese: 我們得見見面，談談晚會的事。

sentences.english: Let me take this opportunity to say something about our wonderful trip.
sentences.chinese: 請讓我趁此機會談談我們的奇妙之旅。

sentences.english: I'd like a candlelight dinner, some dancing and to talk about our future.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一個燭光晚餐，跳跳舞，談談我們的未來。

sentences.english: Come into the dark room here, and let us have one final word alone.
sentences.chinese: 到這邊這個黑屋子裏來吧，我倆單獨談談。

sentences.english: We're going to talk about violence in TV and movies.
sentences.chinese: 我們將談談影視片中的暴力。

sentences.english: I also asked Jeff to talk to Colonel Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 我也請求傑夫與霍爾姆斯上校談談。

sentences.english: Can you talk a little bit about the new legendary for this patch?
sentences.chinese: 你能談談這個版本的新橙武嗎？

sentences.english: So this time, would you please say something about Wuxia novels?
sentences.chinese: 所以，這次想請您談談武俠小說。

sentences.english: I'll have a talk with Cal .
And I want to speak about how we apply them in practice.
sentences.chinese: 我要談談我們在實踐中是如何應用這些原則的。

sentences.english: Now I would like to give you some details every second of-around Thyourksgiving Day in the United Sthlistings.
sentences.chinese: 現在我想給你們詳明談談美國的感恩節。

sentences.english: Go talk to them and tell them how you feel.
sentences.chinese: 試着與他們談談心，告訴他們你的感受。

definition: to say sth
surname Tan
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to discuss/to talk over/CL:個|个[ge4]
to investigate/to probe
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
(coll.) to try to
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
to discuss/to talk about
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
to press charges/to file a complaint
to tell/to inform/to let know
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to give it a try
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
